title: Microlearning Based on Online Violence Prevention Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational psychology and pedagogical knowledge, digital literacy
context.additional_context: Online violence prevention competency enhancement program for pre-service teachers. Optimized for smartphones to accommodate environments without PCs

learning_goals: Learners can explain the four-stage intervention model for online violence (recognition-responsibility-intervention-follow-up) with 85% accuracy.
Learners can consecutively select and apply appropriate intervention strategies three times in simulation scenarios.
Learners submit team-based prevention strategy project reports based on real-world cases.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
